direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods calculate the size of collections, but 'totalSize' calculates the total size across all keys.
Both methods involve iterating over collections to perform a check or calculation.
Both methods modify the state of the map by removing elements or updating sizes.
Both methods access and modify the collections associated with keys.
The 'getCollection' method provides the collection needed for 'size' to calculate its result.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the map is a prerequisite for any size calculation.
Adding elements to the map affects the size calculation.
Removing elements from the map affects the size calculation.
The 'totalSize' method can be used to verify the correctness of the 'size' method.
The 'getCollection' method can be used to verify the collection size returned by 'size'.
